1:
CIRCULAR  16  /  1998 
 
 
SUB: FLIGHT SCHEDULES 
 
 
It has been observed that certain Airlines rush up their requests for changes in their 
existing flight schedule / allotment of additional flight schedule at the eleventh hours and 
almost every week, making it difficult to examine and process the same in such a short 
duration and that too so frequently. 
 
 
It has, therefore, been decided that intending Airlines should submit their requests for 
changes etc. of scheduled flight timings on a monthly basis only and such requests must reach 
this office a fortnight in advance i.e. for changes w.e.f. 15th August 98, requests must reach 
by 1st of August 98 and so on. 
 
 
(J.P. VERMA) 
OFFICER ON SPECIAL DUTY (INT) 
 
(REF: NO.CAS-6  (10) / 98-DIV-I 
Dated : 27.07.1998)
